verses.verse: The hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was upon me, and He brought <S%H3318><s%> me out by the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and set <S%H5117><s%> me down <S%H5117><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the valley; <S%H1237><s%> and it was full <S%H4392><s%> of bones. <S%H6106><s%>

And He caused me to pass <S%H5674><s%> among <S%H5921><s%> them round <S%H5439><s%> about, <S%H5439><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> [there were] very <S%H3966><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the valley; <S%H1237><s%> and lo, <S%H2009><s%> [they were] very <S%H3966><s%> dry. <S%H3002><s%>

And He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> can these <S%H428><s%> bones <S%H6106><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>?" And I answered, <S%H559><s%> "O Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> Thou knowest. <S%H3045><s%>"

Again He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Prophesy <S%H5012><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> these <S%H428><s%> bones, <S%H6106><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'O dry <S%H3002><s%> bones, <S%H6106><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>'

"Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3068><s%> to these <S%H428><s%> bones, <S%H6106><s%> 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will cause breath <S%H7307><s%> to enter <S%H935><s%> you that you may come <S%H2421><s%> to life. <S%H2421><s%>

'And I will put <S%H5414><s%> sinews <S%H1517><s%> on you, make flesh <S%H1320><s%> grow <S%H5927><s%> back <S%H5927><s%> on you, cover <S%H7159><s%> you with skin, <S%H5785><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> breath <S%H7307><s%> in you that you may come <S%H2421><s%> alive; <S%H2421><s%> and you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>' "

So I prophesied <S%H5012><s%> as I was commanded; <S%H6680><s%> and as I prophesied, <S%H5012><s%> there was a noise, <S%H6963><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> a rattling; <S%H7494><s%> and the bones <S%H6106><s%> came <S%H7126><s%> together, <S%H7126><s%> bone <S%H6106><s%> to its bone. <S%H6106><s%>

And I looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> sinews <S%H1517><s%> were on them, and flesh <S%H1320><s%> grew, <S%H5927><s%> and skin <S%H5785><s%> covered <S%H7159><s%> <S%H4605><s%> them; but there <S%H369><s%> was no <S%H369><s%> breath <S%H7307><s%> in them.

Then He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Prophesy <S%H5012><s%> to the breath, <S%H7307><s%> prophesy, <S%H5012><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to the breath, <S%H7307><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Come <S%H935><s%> from the four <S%H702><s%> winds, <S%H7307><s%> O breath, <S%H7307><s%> and breathe <S%H5301><s%> on these <S%H428><s%> slain, <S%H2026><s%> that they come <S%H2421><s%> to life. <S%H2421><s%> "'"

So I prophesied <S%H5012><s%> as He commanded <S%H6680><s%> me, and the breath <S%H7307><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into them, and they came <S%H2421><s%> to life, <S%H2421><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> on their feet, <S%H7272><s%> an exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> army. <S%H2428><s%>

Then He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> these <S%H428><s%> bones <S%H6106><s%> are the whole <S%H3605><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> they say, <S%H559><s%> 'Our bones <S%H6106><s%> are dried <S%H3001><s%> up, and our hope <S%H8615><s%> has perished. We are completely cut <S%H6><s%> off. <S%H1504><s%>'

"Therefore <S%H3651><s%> prophesy, <S%H5012><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will open <S%H6605><s%> your graves <S%H6913><s%> and cause you to come <S%H5927><s%> up out of your graves, <S%H6913><s%> My people; <S%H5971><s%> and I will bring <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"Then you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> when I have opened <S%H6605><s%> your graves <S%H6913><s%> and caused you to come <S%H5927><s%> up out of your graves, <S%H6913><s%> My people. <S%H5971><s%>

"And I will put <S%H5414><s%> My Spirit <S%H7307><s%> within you, and you will come <S%H2421><s%> to life, <S%H2421><s%> and I will place <S%H5117><s%> you on your own land. <S%H127><s%> Then you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> and done <S%H6213><s%> it," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>' "
The word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> again to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"And you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> for yourself one <S%H259><s%> stick <S%H6086><s%> and write <S%H3789><s%> on it, 'For Judah <S%H3063><s%> and for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> his companions <S%H2270><s%>'; then take <S%H3947><s%> another <S%H259><s%> stick <S%H6086><s%> and write <S%H3789><s%> on it, 'For Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> the stick <S%H6086><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> his companions. <S%H2270><s%>'

"Then join <S%H7126><s%> them for yourself one <S%H259><s%> to another <S%H259><s%> into one <S%H259><s%> stick, <S%H6086><s%> that they may become <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H259><s%> in your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

"And when <S%H9201><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> speak <S%H559><s%> to you saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Will you not declare <S%H5046><s%> to us what <S%H4100><s%> you mean by these <S%H428><s%>?'

say <S%H1696><s%> to them, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will take <S%H3947><s%> the stick <S%H6086><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> his companions; <S%H2270><s%> and I will put <S%H5414><s%> them with it, with the stick <S%H6086><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> stick, <S%H6086><s%> and they will be one <S%H259><s%> in My hand. <S%H3027><s%>"'
"And the sticks <S%H6086><s%> on which <S%H834><s%> you write <S%H3789><s%> will be in your hand <S%H3027><s%> before their eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

"And say <S%H1696><s%> to them, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will take <S%H3947><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from among <S%H996><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they have gone, <S%H1980><s%> and I will gather <S%H6908><s%> them from every <S%H5439><s%> side <S%H5439><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> them into their own land; <S%H127><s%>

and I will make <S%H6213><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> will be king <S%H4428><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> of them; and they will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> be two <S%H8147><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> and they will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> be divided <S%H2673><s%> into two <S%H8147><s%> kingdoms. <S%H4467><s%>

"And they will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> defile <S%H2930><s%> themselves with their idols, <S%H1544><s%> or with their detestable <S%H8251><s%> things, <S%H8251><s%> or with any <S%H3605><s%> of their transgressions; <S%H6588><s%> but I will deliver <S%H3467><s%> them from all <S%H3605><s%> their dwelling <S%H4186><s%> places <S%H4186><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> they have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> and will cleanse <S%H2891><s%> them. And they will be My people, <S%H5971><s%> and I will be their God. <S%H430><s%>

"And My servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> will be king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them, and they will all <S%H3605><s%> have <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H259><s%> shepherd; <S%H7462><s%> and they will walk <S%H1980><s%> in My ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> My statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and observe <S%H6213><s%> them.

"And they shall live <S%H3427><s%> on the land <S%H776><s%> that I gave <S%H5414><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> My servant, <S%H5650><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> your fathers lived; <S%H1><s%> and they will live <S%H3427><s%> on it, they, and their sons, <S%H3427><s%> and their sons <S%H1121><s%>' sons, forever <S%H1121><s%>; <S%H5704><s%> and David <S%H5769><s%> My servant <S%H1732><s%> shall be their prince <S%H5650><s%> forever. <S%H5387><s%>

"And I will make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> with them; it will be an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them. And I will place <S%H5414><s%> them and multiply <S%H7235><s%> them, and will set <S%H5414><s%> My sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> in their midst <S%H8432><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>
"My dwelling <S%H4908><s%> place <S%H4908><s%> also will be with them; and I will be their God, <S%H430><s%> and they will be My people. <S%H5971><s%>

"And the nations <S%H1471><s%> will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> who sanctifies <S%H6942><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when My sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> is in their midst <S%H8432><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>"' "
